#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main()
{ int i,t,n,area,x1,x2,y1,y2,temp;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t!=0)
    {
        t--;
        scanf("%d",&n);int a[n],b[n],c[n],d[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d%d%d%d",&a[i],&b[i],&c[i],&d[i]);
            if(a[i]>c[i])
            {
                temp=a[i];
                a[i]=c[i];
                c[i]=temp;
                temp=b[i];
                b[i]=d[i];
                d[i]=temp;
            }
            if(b[i]<d[i])
            {
              temp=b[i];
              b[i]=d[i];
              d[i]=temp;
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]>a[i+1]){x1=a[i];}
            else{x1=a[i+1];}
            if(b[i]<b[i+1]){y1=b[i];}
            else{y1=b[i+1];}
            if(c[i]<c[i+1]){x2=c[i];}
            else{x2=c[i+1];}
            if(d[i]>d[i+1]){y2=d[i];}
            else{y2=d[i+1];}
            a[i+1]=x1;
            b[i+1]=y1;
            c[i+1]=x2;
            d[i+1]=y2;
            area=abs(x1-x2)*abs(y1-y2);
        }
        if(n==1){area=abs(a[0]-c[0])*abs(d[0]-b[0]);}

     printf("%d\n",area);

    }
    return 0;
}
